title: 'Comfortable Fabric and Fit'
body: In this price this one will not disappoint you. Great fit and Soft Fabrics makes it the way that you don't realize how long you are wearing it. In fact I bought my second short of little different color. Only complain is, there were not many color choices. It also has one zipped pocket which big enough to accommodate my wallet.

title: 'Not worth the brand and cost'
body: 'Disappointed with cloth quality. Product description says 100% cotton but it is not. It is mixed fabric and pilling has already occurred on the cloth just after 2 days use even before first wash. Pilling does not occur for pure cotton garments. I trusted the brand "Pepe Jeans" and paid extra buck to get sub grade quality. Guess they are not good at making anything other than their over costly jeans.  Also note the zip pocket is on one side {right} only. The left one is normal pocket and no pocket at the back.'
